name: V in the cyberspace
description:
THIS IS A TECH DEMO NOT THE FINAL GAME 

                                             

 V in the cyberspace

Category: Action adventure 2d Plat-former 

Theme : Neon, Dystopian,Cyberpunk like deus ex 

Story: Player, Wakes up in a futuristic hacker hideout,Explores the area finds a unknown contract to kill two, he meets two people then discovers truth of himself why was he in cyberspace then the game pans out to reveal the title from then the game follows the first act of deus ex kill the bad guy's to get intel about the mission, later he finds out there is a kill switch of bioweapon with Rebel hackers will he save the world ? or kill every one but himself ?

Inspiration: Deus ex,  Cyberpunk 2020 lore book

Art style : 2d with 3d pixel art style inspired from "The Last Night" Game

Controls for the Tech demo

A,S to move
